entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having a conversation with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is listening to his concerns.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: The headmistress of Hogwarts, mentioned as having touched Harry's arm.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: A powerful and evil wizard who is controlling others.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Someone who was controlled by You-Know-Who in the past.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, mentioned as juggling butterbeer bottles.

entities.name: george
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, mentioned as juggling butterbeer bottles.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: A student who is juggling butterbeer bottles with Fred and George.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A powerful wizard mentioned as having his own body.

relationships.description: Harry mentions that Umbridge touched his arm.
Hermione suggests that You-Know-Who controlled Quirrell in the past.
Harry is worried that You-Know-Who might be controlling Umbridge.
Hermione suggests that You-Know-Who could have Umbridge under the Imperius Curse.
Hermione mentions that Harry's scar hurt when nobody was touching him, and compares it to Dumbledore having his own body.
